q1.question:
Given the following code:

Node *n = node_create("sentinel", NULL, NULL);

How much memory is allocated by the line of code above (assume it is in the main function)?

  • Stack ____
  • Heap ____
  • Data ____

q2.question: Which of the following statements regarding the queue functions are true (select all that apply)?

q3.question:
Given the following code:

Queue *q = queue_create(2);

queue_push(q, "Go");
queue_push(q, "Irish");
queue_push(q, "Beat");
queue_push(q, "Buckeyes");

Answer the following questions:

  1. What is the capacity of q? ____
  2. What is the size of q? ____
  3. How would you access the first item in q? ____
  4. What is the first item in q? ____
  5. How would you access the last item in q? ____
  6. What is the last item in q? ____

q4.question:
Use your bin/tail and bin/tac to evaluate the following pipelines:

  1. Pipeline: seq 1 100 | ./bin/tac | ./bin/tail -n 10 | ./bin/tac | ./bin/tail -n 1 ____
  2. Pipeline: seq 1 100 | ./bin/tail | ./bin/tac | ./bin/tac | ./bin/tail -n 1 ____
